question: You are in a room with two doors. One leads to certain death, the other to freedom. There are two guards: one always tells the truth, one always lies. You don't know which is which. You can ask one guard one question. What do you ask?
answer: what would the other guard say
alternate_answers: which door would the other guard say leads to freedom
ask what the other would say
what door would the other guard choose
hint: Ask one guard what the OTHER guard would say about which door leads to freedom, then choose the opposite.
